channel.title: Ceno Browser Announcements
channel.description: RSS feed of announcements from the team behind Ceno Browser

item.title: New version of Ceno Browser (v1.2) released!
item.description:
Please update to the latest version of Ceno Browser by visiting our download page!
You can now choose to enable Bridge Mode on the homepage and help make the Ceno network stronger.
A progress bar has been added to show whether a website is being accessed directly (green) or via the Ceno network (orange).
A loading screen has been added to indicate what's happening "under the hood" when first starting Ceno.
